metadata.title: Current Meter Data Components

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Environmental Satellite, Data
Information Service (NESDIS), National Oceanographic Data Center (NODC)

metadata.description: This file contains time series measurements of ocean currents. These data are obtained from current meter moorings and represent Eulerian method of current measurement, i.e., the meters are deployed at a fixed depth and measure flow past a sensor.  Position, bottom depth, sensor depth, and meter characteristics are reported for each station.  On-line documentation is available on the NOSIE system location on the NODC VAX computer and published in the NODC User's Guide.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To make available measurements of ocean currents.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Annually

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
